source:
# 使用 LSTM 進行序列標註任務(NER)
- Reference:
    - https://www.depends-on-the-definition.com/sequence-tagging-lstm-crf/
    - https://www.depends-on-the-definition.com/guide-sequence-tagging-neural-networks-python/
    - https://www.depends-on-the-definition.com/named-entity-recognition-conditional-random-fields-python/
    - https://confusedcoders.com/data-science/deep-learning/how-to-build-deep-neural-network-for-custom-ner-with-keras
- Dataset: 
    - https://www.kaggle.com/abhinavwalia95/entity-annotated-corpus?select=ner_dataset.csv

# 本程式僅支援以1.x版執行 colab預設是2.x版
%tensorflow_version 1.x
# CRF統計模型: (condition random field) 條件隨機場域 常用於處理序列，常被與HMM一起提及

# 讀入資料
from google.colab import drive
drive.mount('/content/gdrive')
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

data = pd.read_csv('/content/gdrive/MyDrive/AI_&_EdgeComputing_Program/NLP/shared_folder/dataset/ner_dataset.csv', encoding='latin1')
data.head(30)

#Tag為 NER的結果

source:
# 將同句資料(詞,詞性,類別)合併為一筆
agg_func = lambda s: [(w, p, t) for w, p, t in zip(s["Word"].values.tolist(),
                                s["POS"].values.tolist(),
                                s["Tag"].values.tolist())]
grouped_data = data.groupby("Sentence #").apply(agg_func)
sentences = [s for s in grouped_data]
print(sentences[0])

# 統計句長(詞數)並繪長條圖
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
plt.style.use("ggplot")
plt.hist([len(s) for s in sentences], bins=50)
plt.show() #看一下句子長度 顯示多的是20的長度的句子

### 製作對照表 詞典

# 全部不重複字數
words = list(set(data["Word"].values))  #取值轉set，此為小技巧，留下不重複的值，再轉回list (串列)，此串列不具有重複的element
words.append("ENDPAD") #用來截長部短當代號
n_words = len(words)
print('全部不重複字數',n_words)

# 全部不重複標籤數
tags = list(set(data["Tag"].values))
n_tags = len(tags)
print('全部不重複標籤數',n_tags)

max_len = 75  #未必要取這麼長，可以取少然後把多的截掉
word_index = {w: i + 1 for i, w in enumerate(words)} #在dict中使用complement 
tag_index = {t: i for i, t in enumerate(tags)}

text:
全部不重複字數 35179
全部不重複標籤數 17
outputs.name: stdout

source:
### 準備資料集(訓練集，測試集)   

from keras.preprocessing.sequence import pad_sequences
from keras.utils import to_categorical
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split

X = [[word_index[word[0]] for word in sent] for sent in sentences] 
#從文本中取出句子，鋸子中取出詞，詞中取出turple，turple第一個代表詞本身，word_index是剛剛的辭典，找出其編號，最後放入串列[]，即此串列中含有此句子所有詞的編號

X = pad_sequences(maxlen=max_len, sequences=X, padding="post", value=0)  #pad_sequence post是後面，value =0代表補0

y = [[tag_index[word[2]] for word in sent] for sent in sentences] 
y = pad_sequences(maxlen=max_len, sequences=y, padding="post", value=tag_index["O"]) #監督式學習
y = [to_categorical(i, num_classes=n_tags) for i in y] #to_categorical在keras內建中，_num_classses中有17類標籤，此function 會幫忙我們轉成0-16
#print(y[:5])

X_train, X_test, y_train, y_test = train_test_split(X, y, test_size=0.1) #91分

# 欲使用 keras_contrib.layers.CRF  這個module 必須在tensorflow 1.X

!pip install git+https://www.github.com/keras-team/keras-contrib.git

source:
from keras.models import Sequential
from keras.layers import LSTM, Embedding, Dense, TimeDistributed, Dropout, Bidirectional
from keras_contrib.layers import CRF
import keras as k

model = Sequential()
#Word Embedding              #降維 output_dim(數值越大，需要資料量越多) 一般來說可從100開始 #input_length輸入句子的詞數  
model.add(Embedding(input_dim=n_words, output_dim=20, input_length=max_len))
model.add(Bidirectional(LSTM(units=50, return_sequences=True))) #return_sequence預設是false，要打開 #因為如果是false，只會得到最後一個output，但LSTM每一次輸出會取決於上次輸出結果，因此要取得所有Output
model.add(TimeDistributed(Dense(50, activation="relu")))
crf = CRF(n_tags)
model.add(crf)

model.summary()

# 編譯與訓練
model.compile(optimizer="rmsprop",
       loss=crf.loss_function,
       metrics=[crf.accuracy])

history = model.fit(X_train, 
      np.array(y_train), 
      batch_size=32, 
      epochs=5, 
      validation_split=0.1)

# 儲存模型
model.save('/content/drive/MyDrive/Colab Notebooks/序列標注/ner_model.h5')

source:
# 匯製訓練和驗證的準確率

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
plt.plot(history.history["crf_viterbi_accuracy"])
plt.plot(history.history["val_crf_viterbi_accuracy"])
plt.title('Model accuracy')
plt.ylabel('Accuracy')
plt.xlabel('Epoch')
plt.legend(['Train', 'Test'], loc='upper left')
plt.show()

# 匯製訓練和驗證的損失值

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
plt.plot(history.history["loss"])
plt.plot(history.history["val_loss"])
plt.title('Model accuracy')
plt.ylabel('Loss')
plt.xlabel('Epoch')
plt.legend(['Train', 'Test'], loc='upper left')
plt.show()

source:
from seqeval.metrics import f1_score
from seqeval.metrics import accuracy_score

test_pred = model.predict(X_test, verbose=1)
index_tag = {i: w for w, i in tag_index.items()}

def pred2label(pred):
    out = []
    for pred_i in pred:
        out_i = []
        for p in pred_i:
            p_i = np.argmax(p)
            out_i.append(index_tag[p_i].replace("PAD", "O"))
        out.append(out_i)
    return out

pred_labels = pred2label(test_pred)
test_labels = pred2label(y_test)
print("Accuracy: {:.1%}".format(accuracy_score(test_labels, pred_labels)))
print("F1-score: {:.1%}".format(f1_score(test_labels, pred_labels)))
